sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change awa_service_channel.name from a string to a translated_field</description>
        <name>Update type of AWA service channel name </name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function () {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'awa_service_channel');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'name');
	gr.addQuery('internal_type', 'string');
	gr.setWorkflow(false);
	gr.query();
	if (!gr.next()) {
		return;
	}
	gr.setValue('internal_type', 'translated_field');
	gr.update();
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-03-25 16:29:35</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>df655326b7832010ffe5ef54ce11a9b0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update type of AWA service channel name </sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">7f858779db01111086a072c7f496190d</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_df655326b7832010ffe5ef54ce11a9b0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-03-25 16:29:35</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update type of AWA service channel name
